title: Ferrari-Carano Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, August 20, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for a guided tasting featuring one of Sonoma’s most celebrated wineries. This lineup from Ferrari-Carano includes bold reds and vibrant whites that showcase the elegance and richness of Northern California winemaking.

Tasting Fee: $25 (Buy a bottle from the tasting and your fee is refunded)

Featured Wines:

• Ferrari-Carano Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 – 92 pts James Suckling – Full-bodied and layered with black cherry, fig, mocha, leather, and white pepper.

• Ferrari-Carano Merlot 2022 – 92 pts James Suckling, 92 pts Decanter – A velvety blend of Merlot and Syrah with dark fruit, spice, and minerality.

• Ferrari-Carano Siena 2022 – 91 pts James Suckling, 91 pts Wine Enthusiast – A soft, fruit-forward blend with cherry, fig, cedar, and cardamom.

• Ferrari-Carano Pinot Grigio 2023 – 93 pts Wine Enthusiast, 92 pts Tasting Panel – Bright and zippy with citrus, guava, melon, and herbal notes.

Celebrate the best of Sonoma’s terroir—buy a bottle and your tasting is free.
